sentences.cn: …一幅代表一棵松树的象形图画。

sentences.en: Pictograph is the base of conformation of Chinese character.
sentences.cn: 象形字是汉字构造的基础.

sentences.en: The pictograph a mountain was originally three peaks together.
sentences.cn: “山”的象形字原来是三座山峰堆在一起的.

sentences.en: The pictograph for a mountain was originally three peaks together.
sentences.cn: 山的象形字原来是三座山峰堆在一起的.

sentences.en: This paper is of and perfecting the book Naxi Pictograph Character Chart.
sentences.cn: 《纳西象形文字谱》是由方国瑜编撰的一部重要的东巴文字典.

words.tran_cn: 象形文字的，绘画文字的
[语]象形文字；古代石壁画；[统计]统计图表

trans.tran_en: A pictogram is a simple drawing that represents something. Pictograms were used as the earliest form of writing.
